CustomField.formula:
IF( litify_fin__lit_Group_Template__r.Name = 'Expenses Due To Vendors', 'Expense Payment', IF( litify_fin__lit_Originating_Subtab__r.Name = 'Expenses Paid by Firm', 'Expense Reimbursement', IF( CONTAINS(litify_fin__lit_Originating_Subtab__r.Name,'Referral'), 'Referral', IF( CONTAINS(litify_fin__lit_Originating_Subtab__r.Name,'Attorney'), 'Attorney Fee', IF( litify_fin__lit_Group_Template__r.Name = 'Client Fee', 'Due To Client', IF( litify_fin__lit_Group_Template__r.Name = 'Settlement Verdicts', 'Settlement', IF( CONTAINS(litify_fin__lit_Originating_Subtab__r.Name,'Damages'), 'Damages',
'')))))))
CustomField.label: Classification
